title: Chain Lightning
desc:
Post 2255
- Choose a player who hasn't yet gone this round (Unless you're the last player, in which case, you can choose anyone except yourself)
- Your target will draw a copy of this card, and then it will be their turn.
- While this Chain is active, it's allowed for players to play a non-⛓️ card if it's alongside a ⛓️+⚡ card.
- Chain Break: This is played alongside a second ⚡ card. If this occurs, your target draws a random card, instead of a copy of this one.
